String.string: We'll make them choke on the blood they drink.
Good job. I know this wasn't easy.
Collect vampir fangs from noble vampir rebels and insurgents in the manor. [You must select Sinestral Manor (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:203#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Report to Kasador at the Sinestral Manor Servants' Entrance.
